title: Ping Issues
body:
My normal ping used to be **28** but I've noticed these past weeks that my average ping went up to **40**. I also get really high lag spikes like 1000. 

Did Riot changed something with there servers?

replies.body: You might be seeing that ping change if something happened with your local network settings or if your ISP has been having issues. That jump from 28 to 40 doesn't seem to be an issue, but going all the way up to 1000 definitely isn't good. That kind of jump in ping could be packet loss, which you can test for with this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a quick screenshot of what it says and post it here for us to look over together.
Yeah I've been having the same issues of my internet being fine, but league servers don't seem to be cooperating (Live in CA, San Francisco)
